title: Did the Global Conspiracy promote the remedicifer above hydrochloroquine to treat COVID-19?
subtitle: The extended conspiracy theory says that many individuals and organizations planned to promote the Remdisfare on a drug abused by the President of the United States.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The wide-ranging conspiracy theory proves that there are many individuals and organizations that have planned to promote remedisphere as a COVID-19 treatment for HCBD, which is alleged to be highly effective.
